Question: Soteria Battery Innovation Group CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Molicel

Product: INR-21700-P50B

- Ultra-high power lithium-ion battery cell
- Highest energy density of 260Wh/kg
- Offers over 400W of power and 5C ultra-fast charging
- Designed for demanding mobility applications, especially EV Hypercars and EVTOL
- Showcased at CES 2024, in partnership with McMurtry Automotive
- Designed to cater for the premium segment in demanding mobility applications

Source: https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/molicel-showcased-groundbreaking-ultra-high-power-cell-inr-21700-p50b-at-ces-2024-redefining-the-ev-hypercar-industry-with-mcmurtry-302039076.html
Summary_cn:
Molicel

产品：INR-21700-P50B

- 超高功率锂离子电池单体
- 能量密度最高达260Wh/kg
- 提供超过400W的功率和5C超快充电
- 设计用于具有高要求的移动应用，尤其是超级跑车和电动垂直起降飞行器（EVTOL）
- 在CES 2024上与麦克默特里汽车合作展出
- 设计满足高级细分市场在具有挑战性的移动应用领域中的需求

来源：https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/molicel-showcased-groundbreaking-ultra-high-power-cell-inr-21700-p50b-at-ces-2024-redefining-the-ev-hypercar-industry-with-mcmurtry-302039076.html
